DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hd_service_type_header h left join xbs.option_line o on h.primary_service_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.hd_service_activity_header h0 on h.pre_repair_activity_rma=h0.hd_service_activity_header_id left join xbs.hd_service_activity_header h1 on h.pre_repair_activity_so=h1.hd_service_activity_header_id left join xbs.hd_service_activity_header h2 on h.post_repair_activity_rma=h2.hd_service_activity_header_id left join xbs.hd_service_activity_header h3 on h.post_repair_activity_so=h3.hd_service_activity_header_id left join xbs.hd_service_activity_header h4 on h.auto_create_so_rma_cb=h4.hd_service_activity_header_id left join xbs.mdm_price_list_header m on h.prices_list_id=m.mdm_price_list_header_id
DbDetails.Data: h.service_type,o.option_line_value primary_service_type,h.active_cb,h.repair_mode,h0.activity_name pre_repair_activity_rma,h1.activity_name pre_repair_activity_so,h2.activity_name post_repair_activity_rma,h3.activity_name post_repair_activity_so,h4.activity_name auto_create_so_rma_cb,m.price_list prices_list_id,h.description,h.created_by,h.creation_date,h.last_update_by,h.last_update_date,h.hd_service_type_header_id
